thread.title: BREAKING: Gambian president, Jammeh declares state of emergency
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Gambian president, Jammeh declares state of emergency

author: Ayodele Oluwagbemi
title: BREAKING: Gambian president, Jammeh declares state of emergency
text:
The Gambia’s President Yahya Jammeh, has declared state of emergency in the country. 
Jammeh lost an election last month to Adama Barrow and has refused to accept his defeat. 
Barrow, who won the poll and has received the support of the international community, has said he will go ahead with his inauguration on Jan. 19 despite Jammeh’s rejection of the result. 
Details soon
